thread.title: Ian J Cruickshank
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por Ian J Cruickshank

author: Ian J Cruickshank
title: Ian J Cruickshank
text:
Really impressed with the excellent customer care shown by all the Staff we met at your Murcia office.
Please convey our special thanks to Anna and Christina, lovely ladies!
We hope to see you again soon and would not hesitate to recommend you to anyone.
Ian and Sue Cruickshank
